title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ks the pact? Save your father, Wyll. The city will need him to help rebuild. Do the right thing. Give your soul so that your father can live. Break the pact, Wyll. You deserve your freedom. Let your father die. When the city's free, you can take his place.

Make your choice then continue.

Search for Grand Duke Ravengard.

If Wyll severed his pact with Mizora:
